article: During the long history of mankind,people have made thousands and thousands of inventions. Some of them are very important, _ others are less important. Do you know what is the first real invention?  _ first real invention,and one of the most important inventions in _ was the wheel. All transportation and every machine in the world depend on it.   The wheel is the _ yet perhaps the most remarkable of all inventions,because there are no wheels in nature -- no living thing was created with _ . How,then,did man _ to invent the wheel?  Perhaps some early hunters found that they could _ the carcass of a heavy animal _ the forest on logs more easily than they could carry it. _ ,the logs themselves weighed a lot.  It must have taken a great prehistoric thinker a long time to _ two thin slices(pieces)of log _ at their _ by a strong stick. This would roll along just as the logs did,yet by much lighter and easier to handle . _ the wheel and axle came into being ,and with them the first carts.
